mapper.update: update sys_resource set parent_ids = REPLACE(parent_ids, #{oldParentIds}, #{parentIds}) where parent_ids like CONCAT( '%,' , #{id} , ',%' )
mapper.delete: delete from sys_resource where FIND_IN_SET(#{id},parent_ids) or id = #{id}
mapper.select: select max(t1.code) code,max(t1.pos) pos from sys_resource t1 where t1.pos = (select max(t2.pos) from sys_resource t2)

select sr.id,sr.code,sr.description,sr.icon,sr.name,sr.sort,sr.common,sr.pos, sr.status,sr.type,sr.url,srp.name pname,srp.id pid from sys_resource sr left join sys_resource srp ON sr.parent_id=srp.id
sr.name like concat( '%' , #{name} , '%' )
FIND_IN_SET(#{id},sr.parent_ids) or sr.id = #{id}
ORDER BY sr.update_date desc
